body:
## What's Changed
* Attempt to remove unnecessary parentheses by @alxy in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/16
* Simplify the travis script by @alxy in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/21
* improved parenthesis usage by @phidi04 in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/23
* Turner-eng issue#5 by @turner-eng in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/26
* Issue-20_DevTools: Adding dev tools to .travis.yml by @manelbdcosta in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/27
* Numpy exponential format by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/38
* Typo for unary operator + by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/39
* Fixing tests by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/42
* Replace the '$$' tex enclosure with a function input by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/43
* pow(x,y) enabled #35 by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/44
* Solving issue #37: \times not displayed between numbers with exponents by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/45
* Addressing issue #41  by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/46
* Problem with unary opeation not by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/40
* Reworking simplify_output by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/47
* Unary operator followed by a power needs no parenthesis by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/49
* SyntaxError when expression has "lambda" or λ #50 by @emetor in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/51
* Update setup.py by @anukaal in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/48
* temp fix for #54 : deactivate PYthon 3.7 testing by @erwanp in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/55

## New Contributors
* @alxy made their first contribution in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/16
* @phidi04 made their first contribution in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/23
* @turner-eng made their first contribution in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/26
* @manelbdcosta made their first contribution in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/27
* @emetor made their first contribution in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/38
* @anukaal made their first contribution in https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/pull/48

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/erwanp/pytexit/compare/0.3.3...0.4.0
Starting from version 0.2.x, pytexit is automatically tested on Travis to ensure stability
